Information on the drugs given, the dosage and time of

Examination of the placenta, membranes and the
umbilical cord
Examine the placenta and the membranes for completeness as 
follows:
/circle6 Maternal surface of the placenta:
/lozenge6 Hold the placenta in the palms of the hands, keeping the 
palms fl at and the maternal surface facing you. Look for 
the following:
 /circle6 All the lobules (1
